strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative of 1+.
armyRules: The They Shall Know No Fear special rule applies to all formations except the Ordo Malleus Inquisitor Retinue and the Warhound Pack.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Blood Ravens with Ordo Malleus allies

sections.name: Blood Ravens Core Detachments
sections.description: One Orbital Support formation must be taken.

formations.name: 1 Orbital Support
extraUnits: Replace the Vanguard Class Light Cruiser with a Grey Knights Strike Cruiser: 75 points

formations.name: Bikes
formations.units: One Blood Ravens Librarian, any five of the following units: Assault Bikes, Attack Bike

formations.name: Land Speeders
formations.units: One Blood Ravens Librarian, any five of the following units: Land Speeder, Land Speeder Tornado

formations.name: Tacticals
formations.units: One Blood Ravens Librarian, six Tacticals plus transport

sections.name: Blood Ravens Support Detachments
sections.description: One Blood Ravens Support Detachment may be taken per Blood Ravens Core Detachment.

formations.name: Predators
formations.units: Any four of the following units: Predator Annihilators, Predator Destructors

formations.name: Land Raiders
extraUnits: Replace up to four Land Raiders with Land Raider Helios: 25 points each

sections.name: Ordo Malleus Detachments
sections.description: One Ordo Malleus Detachment may be taken per Blood Ravens Core Detachment

formations.name: 0-1 Ordo Malleus Inquisitor Retinue
formations.units: One Ordo Malleus Inquisitor, five Kasrkin plus transport

formations.name: Grey Knights Purgation Squads
formations.units: Two Grey Knights Purgation Squads plus transport
extraUnits: Add two Vortimer Razorbacks or one Doomglaive Dreadnought: 75 points

formations.name: Grey Knights Strike Squads
formations.units: Four Grey Knights Strike Squads plus transport
extraUnits: Add four Vortimer Razorbacks or two Doomglaive Dreadnoughts: 150 points

formations.name: Grey Knights Terminators
extraUnits: Add two Vortimer Land Raiders: 150 points

sections.name: Blood Ravens Aircraft and Collegia Titanica Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.

formations.name: Warhound Pack
extraUnits: Add the 'Independent' special rule to the formation: 50 points

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Replace a Blood Ravens Librarian with a Blood Ravens Chapter Master
Replace an Ordo Malleus Inquisitor with an Ordo Malleus Inquisitor Lord

items.name: Justicar
items.description: Add one Grey Knights Justicar to the formation.

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add up to two Dreadnoughts or Hellfire Dreadnoughts

items.name: Anti-Air
items.description: Add any one of the following units to the formation

items.name: Land Raiders
items.description: Add any number of Land Raiders or Land Raider Helios, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Snipers
items.description: Give all Scouts in the formation 'Sniper' on their Heavy Bolters

items.name: Typhoons
items.description: Replace up to five Land Speeders with an equal number of Land Speeder Typhoons
